sentences.en: A secretary can file papers as efficiently as a floppy disk can store them.
sentences.cn: 秘书归档文件时可以像软盘存储一样高效。

sentences.en: Building good applications efficiently requires that we learn not only to use XML correctly, but that we learn also to use it well.
sentences.cn: 有效地构建良好的应用程序需要我们不仅学习如何正确地使用 XML，还要学习如何将它用好。

sentences.en: He could do his work in life efficiently with a background of domestic comforts.
sentences.cn: 安逸的家庭环境使他能够有效地从事他的事业.

sentences.en: How do you motivate people to work hard and efficiently?
sentences.cn: 你是怎样激励大家奋发高效地工作的？

sentences.en: I work more efficiently on my own.
sentences.cn: 我独自一人工作效率更高.

sentences.en: I work very efficiently and am decisive, and accurate in my judgement.
sentences.cn: 我工作非常有效率，处事果断，而且判断准确。

sentences.en: It is hard to work efficiently in such a confined space.
sentences.cn: 在这样狭小的空间里工作很难提高效率.

sentences.en: It was said that washing powders containing enzymes remove stains more efficiently.
sentences.cn: 据说加酶洗衣粉除污更有效.

sentences.en: It's not easy to design drugs that choose their targets this efficiently.
sentences.cn: 要想设计出能如此有效地选择它们靶的的药物并非易事.

sentences.en: Job satisfaction is essential if we are to work efficiently.
sentences.cn: 要使工作卓有成效,必须保证工作时得心应手.

sentences.en: Others like to use them because they prefer to communicate efficiently and not miss out on any important conversations and connections.
sentences.cn: 另一些人喜欢他们则是因为他们偏好于更有效的通信，不会错过一些重要的交谈和联系。

sentences.en: Services could be operated more efficiently and economically.
sentences.cn: 服务的提供可以更加高效、更加节省。

sentences.en: That means I have to work more efficiently.
sentences.cn: 那就意味着我要工作的更有效率。

sentences.en: The cashier paid the money out efficiently.
sentences.cn: 出纳员付款动作很利索.

sentences.en: The worker oils the machine to operate it more efficiently.
sentences.cn: 工人给机器上油以使机器运转更有效.

sentences.en: They rigged up the ship efficiently.
sentences.cn: 他们手脚利索地安装好了船上的帆缆和索具.

sentences.en: They seemed able to work together very efficiently.
sentences.cn: 他们看来能很有效率地合作。

sentences.en: This liquid conducts heat energy very efficiently.
sentences.cn: 这种液体能十分有效地传导热能.
这油能有效地起润滑作用。

words.tran_cn: 有效率的；有能力的；生效的
有效地；效率高地（efficient的副词形式）
